meta.title: RedCat Multiverse I Play, Learn, Earn
meta.twitterDescription: Find out about the future of games and future of learning with RedCat Multiverse’s Play, Learn and Earn model. We are adding deeper rewards to players' gaming efforts, creating both intrinsic and extrinsic value. Players will earn financial rewards as they build new skills.
meta.twitterTitle: RedCat Multiverse, the world’s first Play, Learn and Earn blockchain game

cta.second: from the creators and thought leaders behind
